pl.myrecipebasket.service

Class CommentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.myrecipebasket.service.CommentService

  • @Service
public class CommentService
extends java.lang.Object
    Object CommentService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (CommentRepository & RecipeRepository) and view layer (HomeController & CommentController). Contains all Comment related business logic of MyRecipeBasket application.
    See Also:
    CommentRepository, RecipeRepository, HomeController, CommentController

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Comment> getAllComments()
      This method retrieves all Comment objects from MyRecipeBasket database
      void saveComment(Comment comment)
      This method persists Comment object in MyRecipeBasket database
      void setCommentRepository(CommentRepository commentRepository)
      This method injects CommentRepository object into CommentService and enables CommentService to perform CRUD operations on Comment database table.
      void setRecipeRepository(RecipeRepository recipeRepository)
      This method injects RecipeRepository object into CommentService and enables CommentService to perform CRUD operations on Recipe database table.

        @Autowired
public void setCommentRepository(CommentRepository commentRepository)

      • setRecipeRepository

        @Autowired
public void setRecipeRepository(RecipeRepository recipeRepository)
        This method injects RecipeRepository object into CommentService and enables CommentService to perform CRUD operations on Recipe database table.
        Parameters:
        recipeRepository - RecipeRepository object

      • saveComment

        public void saveComment(Comment comment)
        This method persists Comment object in MyRecipeBasket database
        Parameters:

      • getAllComments

        public java.util.List<Comment> getAllComments()
        This method retrieves all Comment objects from MyRecipeBasket database
